views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11 and Tested on iPhone X.

MyCCStatusLabel Gives the Opportunity to Custom Color the Status Labels Background of your Control Center (the Description Text that Shows up in the Control Center when using the Toggle Buttons)!

The Tweak also Provides other options for the Control Center Status Labels Features and its StatusBar like hiding the Status Labels when switching on/off a Toggle with the StatusBar Fading Effect or at the Contrary with Showing it when changing Toggles State!

Itâ€™s possible to hide the Control Center StatusBar/Chevron too!

Make your the Status Labels Text and Background of the Control Center on System Wide!

See Screenshots below.

Respring is Needed to Apply any Changes only if Necessary for refreshing Preferences!

Configure options from Settings.
